title: skin idea: Road Worker Rek' Sai
body:
I just thought of this idea when i was eating dinner so here we go:
Q (Queens Wrath):
Q (Pray Seeker):
W (Furious Bite)  A little workers hat peaks at the top :D
W (Unburrow ) An explosion happens as she unburrows.
E: (Tunnel) a mini highway 
R: Hops in a car to the selected tunnel,

Would be great if you could think of more ideas for abilities :D

replies.body: Her Q could be sitting on the side of the road having your 16th smoko for the day still talking about how badarse you were as a young adult and complaining about your $12 an hour
So basically she gets rooted for the rest of the game?
Or even her Q could command the newest champion to do all the hard labour while the rest of the team stands around talking among themselves
